maintenance_message: Project going to be down for a few days. My server's motherboard just burned. - 06/04/2025 (For more info: discord.gg/dPSZuVSnpc)
announcement_message: VRCKit is under frequent DDoS attacks, you may experience issues. I'm actively working on a fix. For updates, please join the Discord. (discord.gg/vrckit) Thanks for your patience and understanding!
